descriptionHTML: Nourishing and smoothing whitening serum for brightening skin, eliminating dark spots, and evening out skin tone, suitable for day and night use, with natural ingredients.

descriptionHTML: Niacinamide face wash gently cleanses and brightens skin, reducing hyperpigmentation and improving skin complexion.

descriptionHTML: Gently cleansing face wash infused with Vitamin C and E to brighten, hydrate, and protect the skin for a radiant glow.

name: O.G Cotton Pads

descriptionHTML: 80-piece pack of organic cotton pads, ideal for makeup removal, skincare applications, and gentle cleansing.

descriptionHTML: Elfinz Lift & Firm Booty Mask with natural snail slime smooths & firms hips and thighs, reducing fatty skin appearance, suitable for all skin types.

name: Elfinz Neck & Decollete Firming Cream

descriptionHTML: Elfinz Neck & Decollete Firming Cream with natural snail slime smooths fine lines and wrinkles, firming and rejuvenating the delicate skin.

name: OG Lip Scrub & Mask

descriptionHTML: 2-in-1 pure glow lip mask & scrub providing 24-hour hydration, gently exfoliating and nourishing lips for a soft feel.

name: OG Aqua Jelly Highlighter Stick

descriptionHTML: OG jelly highlighter stick is a bouncy, water-based gel stick that delivers a long-lasting, highly pigmented shine for a natural, wet-look finish.
